about_the_game:
Princess Parent is a modern version of classic life simulation games where you play the parent of a young girl.

Schedule her time! With timeless parenting gameplay, you will guide your daughter's upbringing, choose which activities, lessons and jobs your daughter will do each monthly cycle.

Starting from the serene heartland of Masan, your daughter's life will reveal a tapestry of new destinations and kindred spirits, weaving a rich narrative of growth and exploration.

Will you journey to the fabled mining realms of Eryx, or perhaps venture to the forlorn expanses near Zuhril, where the earth lies cloaked in ash, and rumors speak of ancient dragons that may yet dwell there ...





Explore a range of classes for your daughter to learn within a tech tree, with each one unlocking new events and a range of possible endings.





Immerse yourself in a narrative that unfolds day by day.





Embark on a narrative adventure where the choices you make offer a myriad of endings, each offering a distinct and captivating resolution to your daughter's journey.



Princess Parent, a new parent simulation game produced by a small, passionate team based in London in the UK.

name: Princess Parent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64 bit versions only
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Princess Parent is a love letter to classic life simulation games. Enjoy a new parenting simulation where you schedule her time and make her choices until she's 18. Will she become a housewife or a dragon princess?
